body_content.explanation: suitable for eating as a snack (= a small amount of food that is eaten between meals):
examples: It's time to get familiar with edamame, or the totally snackable pods of young soybean plants.
They serve many types of snackable bar food.

body_content.explanation: (of articles, videos, etc. on the internet) that you can read or play in small amounts or for a short time:
examples: Make your videos "snackable". Keep each video less than four minutes long.
The rise of smart mobile devices has made snackable content an integral part of today’s marketing mix.
